page.title: 11Thame Services 1
page.content: Police P.C. Barry comes into the police station at 8 a.m. and signs on. Then he looks into his box which tells him what to do in the day. Today P.C. Barry is going to see a dog that bites people and a tyre that is defective. That takes him until midday when he has his lunch, only 45 minutes break. Then he visits schools, old people's homes etc. At about 3.30 he reports back to the station for the last half an hour of his shift. At 4.00 p.m. another P.C. takes over until midnight. That is a day in the life of P.C. Barry. Ambulance We visited the Ambulance Station and learnt that you need 4 "O" levels and a clean licence to be a driver. You have to pass a special medical course. The ambulance costs 28,000 pounds, weighs 3 tons and can go at 90 miles per hour.There are 3 ambulances in Tham
